text: William Eugene Burrows Jr. (November 30, 1945 â€“ June 24, 2019), known by his stage name Billy Drago, was an American actor. He was known for his villain roles. His best known roles were in Clint Eastwood's western Pale Rider and Brian De Palma's The Untouchables. He also had roles in the television series The Adventures of Brisco County, Jr. and Charmed.
